titles: Merie tales of the made men of Gotam gathered to gether by A.B. of phisike doctour.

author: Boorde, Andrew, 1490?-1549.
publisher: Imprinted at London in Fletstret, beneath the Conduit, at the signe of S. John euangelist, by Thomas Colwell,
